name: Search
description: User searched for products, services, etc.

name: Product Search Result
description: User viewed a product list or category

name: Promotion Viewed
description: User viewed promotion

name: Promotion Clicked
description: User clicked on promotion

name: Product Clicked
description: User clicked on a product

name: Product Viewed
description: User viewed a product details

name: Product Added
description: User added a product to their shopping cart

name: Product Removed
description: User removed a product from their shopping cart

name: Cart Viewed
description: User viewed their shopping cart

name: Checkout Started
description: User initiated the order process (a transaction is created)

name: Checkout Step Viewed
description: User viewed a checkout step

name: Checkout Step Completed
description: User completed a checkout step

name: Payment Info Entered
description: User added payment information

name: Order Completed
description: User completed the order

name: Order Updated
description: User updated the order

name: Order Refunded
description: User refunded the order

name: Order Cancelled
description: User cancelled the order

name: Coupon Entered
description: User entered a coupon on a shopping cart or order

name: Coupon Applied
description: Coupon was applied on a user's shopping cart or order

name: Coupon Denied
description: Coupon was denied from a user's shopping cart or order

name: Coupon Removed
description: User removed a coupon from a cart or order

name: Product Added to Wishlist
description: User added a product to the wish list

name: Product Removed from Wishlist
description: User removed a product from the wish list

name: Wishlist Product Added to Cart
description: User added a wishlist product to the cart

name: Product Shared
description: Shared a product with one or more friends

name: Cart Shared
description: Shared the cart with one or more friends

name: Product Reviewed
description: User reviewed a product
